data.name: Rogue North
data.detailed_description:
Gameplay

Rogue North is a survival rogue-lite focused on a thick, cold atmosphere, as well as extremely deadly firefights. Survive through the worst winter in history as you attempt to make your way through a war torn Canada to escape. Grit your teeth through bone-chilling blizzards, repair bleeds and bone fractures, and seek merchant camps to restock and outfit your character. Prepare accordingly, there's a long, cold walk between camps.

Story

35 years ago, the world's largest oil reserves were discovered under many parts of Canada, But it was impossible to get efficiently. However, Russia quietly pioneered the machines required to unearth the black gold over the span of 25 years. All the puzzle peices fell into place for a swift invasion. Even so, It wasn't long before the invader's rampant corruption led to a fracture in the invasion force. Which led combatants to revolt against their leaders in favour of controlling the captured areas themselves...

... "Many people have stayed for one reason or another. I myself thought I could wait it all out. However, the pressure of this brutal mess of an occupation mixed with the worst winter in recent history is just too much, It's not safe to stay here anymore. Good thing the ports on the East Coast are still functioning, that might be my ticket out."

Basic Features

  • Selectable backpacks, hats, and vests. Each with their own weight, ammo capacity, and warmth properties
  • Bleeds, fractures and hypothermia are things you need to be prepared to fix.
  • Dynamic, reactive enemies with varying skill levels and tactics.
  • Friendly, not so friendly, and hostile factions
  • Large handcrafted levels. Allowing for a wide range of intensities
  • Dynamic weather that will have you staring at your warmth meter

data.short_description: An intense survival rogue-lite that has you fear every bullet. Attempt to escape from an invasion of Canada during one of the worst winters in history. Prepare accordingly, there's a long walk ahead of you.
